children.title: Path to dprint
children.description: Specify a custom installation of dprint to use. Otherwise, the extension uses a project-local installation, if any, or else a global installation, if any. If none are available, it falls back to the bundled version.

children.title: Debug logging
children.description: Log debug information to the extension console

title: Default configuration
description: Configuration options to use when there is no configuration file. Can be overridden by project-specific configuration.

children.title: Line width
children.description: The width of a line the formatter will try to stay under. Note that this limit will be exceeded in certain cases.

children.title: Indent width
children.description: The number of spaces for an indent when using spaces or the number of characters to treat an indent as when using tabs.

children.title: Use tabs
children.description: Whether to use tabs (true) or spaces (false).

children.title: New line kind
children.description:
The kind of newline to use.

• auto: For each file, uses the newline kind found at the end of the last line.
• crlf: Uses carriage return, line feed.
• lf: Uses line feed.
• system: Uses the system standard (ex. `crlf` on Windows).
